column4: Hey guys, I have a problem. I just bought a SanDisk Ultra Backup flashdrive, and when I plug it in, it doesn't automount. All of my other flashdrives do and this flashdrive automounts in Windows, can someone tell me if it's possible to fix
Do you want me to pastebin the output?
Might be easier to do "dmesg | tail" first, then watch that window while you plug itin.
